column1: Little Goat Diner////Loved it.  My sister and I went here for a Wednesday morning brunch.  There were SO many options on the menu that sounded good.  We decided to share a Cinnamon Roll
column3: and the chicken taco special.  First of all
column4: the cinnamon roll was one of the best I've ever had.  They not only nailed the goey-ness
column5: but also nailed the frosting! The French toast was good.  It was a unique dish and I love trying new things.  And the chicken tacos had a tasty slaw and fresh Guac.  The tortillas were also very fresh.  My sister lived her latte- she said it was especially frothy.  I had a nice Hibiscus tea.  May have to come back again some day when I'm in the area again!
